comment.author: 8947481@N05
comment._content: This is La Corbiere lighthouse on the island of Jersey, first lit in 1874. I visited the site in January this year.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/8947481@N05] Well spotted! Thanks for the info, it must be a beautiful place to visit. Here are some other lovely pictures of the lighthouse. Library of Congress:
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/8947481@N05] Good call!  Jersey - hmmm!  I wonder if Edward Hungerford went there, or just collected a great photo for his album?

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons]  Yes, I'd say the top photo is of the Pink and White Terraces in NZ.
